_templates.javolution.context

Class LocalContext.Reference

  • java.lang.Object
    • _templates.javolution.context.LocalContext.Reference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reference
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextFormat.LocalReference
    Enclosing class:
    LocalContext

    public static class LocalContext.Reference
extends java.lang.Object
implements Reference

    This class represents a reference whose setting is local to the current LocalContext. Setting outside of any LocalContext scope affects the reference default value (equivalent to setDefault(java.lang.Object)).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.Object _defaultValue
      Holds the default value for this reference.
      private boolean _hasBeenLocallyOverriden
      Indicates if this reference value has ever been locally overriden (optimization, most applications use default values).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Reference()
      Default constructor (default referent is null).
      Reference(java.lang.Object defaultValue)
      Creates a local reference having the specified default value.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public final java.lang.Object get()
        Returns the local value for this reference. The first outer LocalContext is searched first, then all outer LocalContext are recursively searched up to the global root context which contains the default value.
        Specified by:
        get in interface Reference
        Returns:
        the context-local value.

      • retrieveValue

        private java.lang.Object retrieveValue()

      • set

        public void set(java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the local value (referent) for this reference.
        Specified by:
        set in interface Reference
        Parameters:
        value - the new local value or null to inherit the outer value.

      • getDefault

        public java.lang.Object getDefault()
        Returns the default value for this reference.
        Returns:
        the defaultValue.

      • getLocal

        public java.lang.Object getLocal()
        Returns the local (non-inherited) value for this reference.
        Returns:
        the local value or null if none (value to be inherited or not set).

      • setDefault

        public void setDefault(java.lang.Object defaultValue)
        Sets the default value for this reference.
        Parameters:
